# Height Models

## Total Height
```{r residuals}
htresid <- resid(height.mod)
plot(perf_dat$duration, htresid) #residuals against a predictor

plot(height.mod) #model residuals

plot_grid(plot_model(height.mod, type = "diag"))

```
There are no patterns in the residuals. Good.
